title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: ADDIE Model-Based Integration of Civic Education and Indigenous Knowledge

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design a civic education program incorporating indigenous knowledge by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation).
Learners can evaluate the scientific value of indigenous knowledge and develop locally applicable educational modules by analyzing a case study from North Sulawesi, Indonesia.
Learners can create a hybrid assessment tool to measure cultural understanding and civic engagement competencies through project-based evaluation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
